title: Opinion: Pharmacist oversight must be built into prescription kiosks
description: Pharmacy kiosks can expand access and convenience, but only when paired with pharmacist-led safeguards that ensure safe and coordinated medication use.
content: Pharmacy kiosks can expand access and convenience, but only when paired with pharmacist-led safeguards that ensure safe and coordinated medication use.
